name: Haniwa Night - ハニワ・ナイト
name_original: Haniwa Night - ハニワ・ナイト
description:
Collect clay to build health as you dodge fairies in this game about a girl who has a duty to deliver a message through a soul during Obon, but who wants to spend the festival with a special someone as well.

 
妖精を避けたり、粘土を拾ってＨＰを伸ばしたりしながら誰かの霊魂で情報を依頼人に届けるという頼みを任せられている、そしてお祭りの期間に大切な人と一緒に過ごしたがっている女の子、というゲームです。

  • Jennifer Raye - Production and Programming (Gameplay)
  • FireFox - Programming (Engine, Frontend and Systems)
  • Nekon - Character Art, Cutscene Art and Animation
  • KurantoB- Background Art and Japanese Translation
  • RaeRae - Music and Writing
  • Aly Doglesbian - Playtesting
  • Emma Bonne - Playtesting

Made in 74 hours for the Touhou Station Game Jam!
